name: Zombie Bullet: Sniper Army
description:
The explosion changed it all. At first, people started feeling very sick and the illness spread fast. A few days later, people began to die… but THEY CAME BACK! Most of the Earth’s population is infected and now turned into zombies, starving for human brains.

There’s no possible cure. Our only solution is to get rid of them.

Find the best weapons hidden in the map and shoot like there were no tomorrow… Because it might not be one!

Send the zombies back to the grave and save the city on this amazing shooting game.

DO NOT GET BITTEN!!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- Daily Rewards
- Unlockable Weapons
- Custom Difficulty
- Unlockable Game Modes
